actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 10 (2d6+3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13), if it is a Huge or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. The octopus can grapple up to two creatures at one time.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

special_abilities.name: Underwater Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The octopus's Stealth is 18 while underwater.

special_abilities.name: Water Breathing
special_abilities.desc: The octopus can breathe only underwater.
